Проснитесь и пойте, мистер Фримен… Проснитесь и пойте… Нет, я не хочу сказать, что вы спите на работе…
Никто не заслуживает отдыха больше вашего. И все усилия мира пропали бы даром, пока…
М-м-м… Скажем просто, что ваш час снова пробил.
Нужный человек не в том месте может перевернуть мир.
Так проснитесь же, мистер Фримен… Проснитесь, вас снова ждут великие дела.

Обзор на Half-Life 2. Пишу этот обзор очень осторожно, ибо об этой игре написать что-то плохое просто воспрещено! Игра просто великолепна! Нас переносит в ту же атмосферу, что и в первой части. Мы игрем за того же учёного Гордона Фримена. Вообще смысла нет описывать всё, из-за того, что в эту игру играли почти все. Игра 2004 года, и графика в неё уж точно шагнула вперёд. Движок Source выдал себя на высшем уровне. Геймплей игры почти идеален, как и во второй части. Физика в игре стала ещё лучше. Что говорить про сюжет (чисто моё мнение), мне он понравился, но это не прям уж глубокий непредсказуемый сюжет с несколькими концовками и т.д. Но атмосфера, я повторюсь, меня она зацепила. Саундтрек в игре тоже порадовал. Ну и конечно же оружие, его много и оно проработано на высшем уровне. Мультиплеер в игре присудствет, но он почти мёртв, также существует огромное количесво модов и дополнений для игры, некоторые из них влились в отдельные игры. Главный из модов - это мод Sanergy (о нём я напишу обзор позже). 
В итоге игра на 98 из 99, 5 из 5, 10 лямбд из 10. Шедевр десятилетия!

I had a ton of fun playing HL2 only because of the secret movement options. Prop jumping and strafe bunny hopping is an absolute blast and I would recommend this game just for that reason alone.

For what it is, its got charm. But ....

The gunplay is pretty fun (if you know a few hidden mechanics to speed up the reloading process) and the levels at the beginning are good, but once you get out of the city and into the water with the game's first vehicle, get ready for some serious padding.

Imagine this, you are being forced to go on a freaking boat and car ride for most of the HL2's playtime with barley enough enemies to makes things feel more purposeful. The vehicle levels are baron and boring and it feels like it was put into the game just to show off the engine. HL2 also suffers from the "Hey, look what our engine can do, isn't that great!" factor where they should have focused on making fun levels.

The enemy variety is pretty pitiful compared to the first game. You pretty much fight 6 enemies through the entire game and most of them are just a copy paste of the civil protection enemies but with more health and very slight tweaks. You think with the world being overrun by aliens they would have tons of things for you to kill that isn't the effing combine soldiers, How about some of the enemies from HL1 or even tampered versions of them to suit the combine, but they dont. Most of the interesting enemies from the first game were completely cut, including some really rad cut HL2 enemies like the Cremator or the Synth and super combine soldiers.

It doesn't help that most of the focus in Half-Life 2 is on its mediocre story. To be honest I dont care for story in fps games, and it pisses me off to no end that the NPC's in these type of games slow the flow to a halt where I have to sit and do nothing just listening or watching them do pointless crap instead of having you play the game!! They just have no real purpose except slow you down, unlike HL1 where you can skip most the of interactions by ignoring them completely or killing the NPC.

Half-Life 2 is a good game with some really odd decisions that hurt the game than helped it. If you want to play a game from the Half-Life series that represents why the series has a special place in the communities hearts, just buy the first one or Black Mesa, and then play HL2 and you will see exactly what I mean.
Half-Life in bestform. Wenn ihr Fans der Reihe seit empfehle ich auch diesen Teil und wenn nicht dann kauft ihn euch trotzdem.

2004년 GOTY 최다 수상작. 메타크리틱 PC게임 부문 최고점수 96점을 받은 4작품 중 하나(나머지 세 작품은 하프라이프1, 바이오쇼크1, GTA5이다. 사실 오렌지 박스도 포함되지만 이것은 게임 패키지인데다 주 게임은 하프라이프 2이므로 논외로 하자.)인 명작게임이다. 2004년 게임임에도 불구하고 급격하게 발전하는 게임 시장에서 아직까지도 많이 회자되며 찬양받는다는 것은 어떤 의미인지 말하지 않아도 알 수 있을 것이다. 하프라이프 1에 비하면 게임 진행이 더 선형적으로 변했지만, 다른 것들이 이것을 충분히 커버쳐준다. 여러 가지 의미로 기념비적이고 위대한 작품이다.
스팀유저라면 라이브러리에 이 게임은 있어야 한다고 생각한다.

É Half Life 2 irmão, se você tá olhando análise pra saber se compra ou não Half Life, já tá errado. Ter Steam e não ter Half Life é um pecado, apenas. Falar de Half Life é uma coisa meio complicada pra mim. O primeiro Half Life foi um jogo que eu cresci jogando e não parei de jogar até hoje, vira e mexe instalo pra dar uma revisitada na Black Mesa de 1998( com textura um pouco motificada eu sei, maaas...). Eu sou muito fã...o jogo é tão bom que dá até vontade de negativar só de raiva por conta de uma sequencia não ter saído até hoje(sequencia do ep2 eu digo). No momento o jogo que eu mais estou jogando é Counter Strike Global Offensive, mas se um Half Life 3 fosse lançado eu esqueceria rapidinho. Não tem como descrever HL2, só joga aí cara, e seja feliz...

So I bought this game just to write a review on it because it has got to be the hands down worst game I've ever played. I own this game on Xbox 360 and it has the worst optimization I've ever seen. This game is pretty much unplayable on console. This is the first time I've ever had a problem with a game on console after switching from trash PC. This game's story is just god awful, it makes no sense! Your character doesn't even talk the whole game! Unlike COD Infinite Warfare (absolutey amazing) this game doesn't have good characters or dialogue. They are incredibly cliche and clunky. If I had a dollar for every time I walked into dumb Alex and she didn't react, I'd have about a billion bucks. All in all, this game is absolute trash, if you want a real game experience just buy a playstation or an xbox and buy any indie game and it will be better than this garbage.

I know this is a pretty unpopular opinion but I've never really liked this game.
I played it a bunch on Xbox360 a few years ago and then got it in the valve complete pack a few less years ago.
I love Half-Life 1 and I thought H-L:2 Episode 1 was kind of ok. But Half-Life 2 always felt like pretty much a glorified tech demo.
For it's time yeah sure the physics engine was impressive, but the amount of the times the story or action would grind to a halt so you can load a pile of bricks onto a plank or a lift or something. Like I think it's more than 3, and each one is more annoying. Like ok you want some puzzles I can dig that but don't stop the game in the middle of me fleeing for my life from an army of alien nazis to put a small crate onto a big crate so I can hop a chainlink fence. or at least don't do it more than once.
There are 2 overly long and mostly boring vehicle sections as well.
The gravity gun is cool but again it hasn't really dated well considering how much of a prominent place it has. Like again for the time I'm sure it was fine, but there are so many games where you can pick things up and throw them. It's pretty much treated like "oh look what we can do" like the dialouge when you get is pretty much "hey come here and try this new gravity gun(tm) it's so good pick up things and throw them whooo this is not a tech demo"
It probably doesn't help that aside from the bits I enjoy like most of Ravenholme, some of the Antlion parts and...other Parts I think, Pretty much everything good the game does can be recreated in Gmod in under half an hour. Not that I'm a huge fan of Gmod either really but It doesn't help a game age well when every asset and weapon is available in a sandbox mod-game with the same graphics and so much more to do than pile 4 bricks onto a beam or listen to scientist man talk at you about teleporters for 20 minutes.
To be clear I don't hate this game, I think it's a slightly dated mostly solid but boring fps, but I see so many reviews and people saying it's the best fps ever made or that there hasn't been a better game made since. Like thats your opinion and I respect that but I just can't help wondering what it is that you're seeing that I'm not.
There are parts in the game I kinda like, but the overall package is just way too bloated and contrived feeling.

本着重温经典的心思入了Half-Life全集，然而……
游戏是好游戏，自带简体中文以及中文配音，绝对有诚意啊！
但是不知道为什么，玩一会儿之后就会头晕，玩其他FPS还没遇到过这个问题，并且我必须说，之前不是没玩过Half-Life，并没有出现头晕的情况啊……
强忍着玩了几次，实在坚持不下去了，封盘。
或许是被现在的游戏惯坏了，对于Half-Life的画面有些无法接受，操作手感与当前主流FPS也大相径庭，加上玩起来实在是晕，弗里曼博士，你就只好作为收藏品躺在我的游戏库里啦。
手持老爷机、经典游戏爱好者、Valve粉丝，可以等待打折入手。
对画面有要求、晕3D、杀戮快感追求者，慎入！

Stará dobrá klasika. A že stará doopravdy hodně. Svého času hodnocená jako nejlepší hra všech dob. I po takovém čase má stále své kouzlo. Nemonotónní příběh v propracovaném světě, ve kterém najít správnou cestu je kolikrát zábavné puzzle. Tuhle hru chce ale hrát jen pro závan nostalgie, protože herní zážitky jsou nyní na úplně jiné úrovni. Takže nesrovnávat, jen vychutnávat a vzpomínat.

Este juego es lo mejor del mundo, fin.

[b]Enjoyment:[/b]  [i]9/10[/i] 

I enjoyed this game very much, and I actually cared about the characters, which some games have trouble making me do. I did get frustrated for some parts but it was mostly because i'm an idiot and didn't pay attention.

---

[b]Story:[/b] [i]7/10[/i]

Not a stellar story, but it kept me engaged and gave me a good reason to complete my objective and not just saying "because that is the objective." The story starts in a place and time with nothing explained, and leaves you to figure out bits and pieces, which I prefer instead of being force fed everything.

---

[b]Gameplay:[/b] [i]8/10[/i]

This game is very unique and original compared to other FPSs of the time. It actually requires you to interact with the world beyond opening doors and pushing buttons, and it doesn't quite have the feeling of "just another shooter game"

---

[b]Replayability:[/b] [i]8/10[/i]

Didn't quite make me want to play though again, but actually made me want to get all the achievements.

---

[b]Graphics:[/b] [i]8/10[/i]

I try not to give games extra credit or lower credit based on graphics, except for in very special cases. Half Life 2 has the best graphics available in 2004/5, and I see no way it affected my gameplay in any way.

---

[b]Bugs/Glitches:[/b] [i]9/10[/i]

I encountered no game breaking glitches, and no significant glitches except for a few well known ones that didn't bother me.

----

[b]OVERALL: 8/10[/b]

I truly enjoyed Half Life 2, and despite a few flaws, I feel that this game is one of my favorites.

我的第一部FPS。之前虽然也有打过FPS，但是大都觉得无聊透顶，没能认真打到通关。这游戏把冒险解密与FPS结合得天衣无缝，作为一个讨厌纯FPS的人也能愉快地玩下去。选的普通难度，由于FPS苦手，前期死得意识模糊，后来习惯了就不怎么死了。解密没有什么难度，卡关多是因为眼瞎找不到路，基本多走走看看就能继续下去。前期不习惯的时候略晕，后面基本没感觉了。总体来说，相当不错的一个游戏。还有必须要说，莱恩霍姆真是太阴暗了！！！
